jobDescription: Responsibilities: Help receive parts, unpack boxes, put items awayHelp packing stuff to ship outFollow up on open POs (run a weekly report) that are past due and expediteFollow up on sending emails after shipping to the main contacts to include packing slip and tracking numberHelp preparing required shipping docs specially when specific requirement are neededCreate manual packing slip specially if we need one per box to make sure it matches what is in each crateAudit the packages going out and compare with packing slip to make sure nothing Is missing or is extraFollow up on the shipping status of major/ time sensitive orders and provide updates to key stakeholdersPossibly help with purchasing, kittingParticipate in cycle count program Manufacturing support activities: "culling" of the free-stock bins of SV2 product.mid year inventory count of WIP.Many and various lower level production tasks that we could have them take on. Examples would be gluing mast tubes, sanding out umbilical ribbons, cleaning molds, etc. Physical requirements: Able to lift 50#  Traits: Team playerFollows instructionsAttention to DetailAttention to Detail (yes wrote that twice)Proficient with computers and computer systemsGood communicator
